thread.title: Parker to Webcast Annual Meeting of Shareholders on October 28 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern
thread.title_full: Parker to Webcast Annual Meeting of Shareholders on October 28 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern

title: Parker to Webcast Annual Meeting of Shareholders on October 28 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern
text:
Parker to Webcast Annual Meeting of Shareholders on October 28 at 9:00 a.m. Eastern October 20, 2015 09:10 ET | Source: Parker Hannifin Corporation 
CLEVELAND, Oct. 20, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it will webcast its Annual Meeting of Shareholders, which is scheduled for Wednesday, October 28, 2015, beginning at 9:00 a.m., Eastern time. 
Parker’s Chief Executive Officer, Tom Williams, is scheduled to make a presentation at the meeting to review the company's performance and strategy. A live webcast of the presentation will be accessible on Parker's investor information website at www.phstock.com and also will be archived on the site. 
With annual sales of approximately $13 billion in fiscal year 2015, Parker Hannifin is the world's leading diversified manufacturer of motion and control technologies and systems, providing precision-engineered solutions for a wide variety of mobile, industrial and aerospace markets. The company employs approximately 55,000 people in 50 countries around the world. Parker has increased its annual dividends paid to shareholders for 59 consecutive fiscal years, among the top five longest-running dividend-increase records in the S&P 500 index. For more information, visit the company's website at www.parker.com , or its investor information website at www.phstock.com . ### Contact: Media – Aidan Gormley, Director, Global Communications and Branding 216/896-3258 aidan.gormley@parker.com Financial Analysts – Robin J. Davenport, Vice President, Corporate Finance 216/896-2265 rjdavenport@parker.com Related Articles other press releases by Parker Hannifin Corporation
